data.name: Householder planning application
data.description: A simplified process for applications to alter or enlarge a single house (but not a flat), including works within the boundary/garden

data.name: Full planning permission
data.description: This application is needed when making detailed proposals for developments which are not covered by a householder application or permitted development rights

data.name: Outline planning
data.description: Applications that are used to understand whether the basic nature of a development is viable

data.name: Reserved matters
data.description: This application is only required when the applicant has already been granted outline planning permission. Reserved matters can include appearance, means of access, landscaping, layout and scale

data.name: Planning permission for relevant demolition in a conservation area
data.description: An application for proposals involving substantial demolition of any unlisted building or structure in a conservation area

data.name: Listed building consent
data.description: An application for any alteration, extension, or demolition of a listed building

data.name: Advertising
data.description: An application for all types of advertisements and signs

data.name: Lawful development certificate
data.description: A legal document stating the lawfulness of past, present or future building use, operation or other matters, signifying that enforcement action cannot be carried out against the development

data.name: Prior approval
data.description: This applies to  developments with permitted development rights (where developments are granted planning permission by national legislation without the need to submit a planning application)

data.name: Removal/variation of conditions (S73)
data.description: Applications for a removal or variation of a condition after planning permission has been granted

data.name: Approval (discharge) of conditions
data.description: An application to have conditions approved which have been applied at the time of granting a planning permission to limit and control the way in which the planning permission has been implemented

data.name: Consent under TPO
data.description: An application that will affect a protected tree including those covered by a Tree Preservation Order (TPO) or those which grow in a conservation area

data.name: Non-material amendment
data.description: An application for any minor changes to proposals that have already been approved

data.name: Permission in principle
data.description: An alternative way of getting planning permission for housing-led development which separates the consideration of matters of principle from the technical detail of the development

data.name: Development relating to the onshore extraction of oil and gas
Hedgerow removal notice
data.description: An application for anyone proposing to remove a hedgerow, or part of a hedgerow

data.name: Notification of proposed works to trees in a conservation area
data.description: Notification, 6 weeks prior to works being carried out, of proposed works to a tree in a conservation area that is not subject to a Tree Preservation order

data.name: Adjoining premises
data.description: The addresses of any adjoining properties

data.name: Advertisement period
data.description: The amount of time you're planning for your advert to be on display

data.name: Agent contact details
data.description: Details needed for contacting the person representing the applicant

data.name: Agent name and address
data.description: Details about the person representing the applicant

data.name: All types of development: Non-residential floorspace
data.description: Details of any new non-residential development involved in the proposal

data.name: Applicant contact details
data.description: Details needed for contacting the applicant

data.name: Applicant name and address
data.description: Details about the applicant

data.name: Assessment of flood risk
data.description: An assessment needed for any developments within any flood risk zones

data.name: Authority employee/member
data.description: Any connection between the applicant or agent and the local authorityâ€™s staff or elected members that could present a conflict of interest

data.name: Biodiversity and geological conservation
data.description: Details of any impact to biodiversity or geological convservation

data.name: Biodiversity net gain
data.description: Information to show how the development will protect or improve wildlife habitats on the site, and whether any exemptions or special rules apply

data.name: Certificate of lawfulness for proposed works - Interest in listed buildings
data.description: A legal document stating the lawfulness of proposed works to a listed building

data.name: Checklist
data.description: Details of the national planning requirements the applicant should submit along with the application

data.name: Condition(s) - removal
data.description: An application to change or remove conditions which can be proved are no longer relevant or reasonable

data.name: Declaration
data.description: Applicants and agents must declare information provided is correct

data.name: Designated areas
data.description: Areas that are protected because of their natural and cultural importance

data.name: Demolition
data.description: Permission or prior approval that may be required to demolish a building

data.name: Describing what is on the site at the time of application
Description of current use, building works or activity
data.description: Please state for which of these you need a lawful development certificate/building works (you must tick at least one option):

data.name: Description of the proposal
data.description: Details about the proposal

data.name: Description of the proposed development including any non-residential development
Description of proposed works, impacts and risks

data.description: Application to have conditions removed

data.name: Eligibility
data.description: Details of the applicant's eligibility to make an application

data.description: Checking eligibility for prior approval

data.description: Checking eligibility for prior approval

data.name: Eligibility - The current building and site
data.description: Checking eligibility for prior approval

data.name: Eligibility - The proposed development
data.description: Checking eligibility for prior approval

data.name: Employment
data.description: Information about employees

data.name: Equipment and method used
data.description: Information about the equipment and methods proposed

data.name: Existing use
data.description: Application for development that doesn't change the existing use of the building

data.name: Explanation for proposed demolition work
data.description: Justification for proposed demolition work

data.name: Foul sewage
data.description: Description of how sewage will be dealt with for the development

data.name: Grounds for application
data.description: Description of development

data.name: Grounds for application for a lawful development certificate
data.description: Description of development

data.name: Grounds for application (information about the existing use(s))
data.description: Current use of the site

data.description: Proposed use of development

data.description: Does proposal include use or storage of hazardous substances? This module is used to determine if hazardous substances consent would also be required

data.name: Hours of operation
data.description: Hours of opening for each non-residential use proposed

data.name: Identification of tree(s) and description of works
data.description: Details of trees and proposed work to them

data.name: Industrial or commercial processes and machinery
data.description: Activities and processes which would be carried out on the site and the end products including plant, ventilation, or air conditioning

data.name: Information in support of a lawful development certificate
data.description: Information in support of a lawful development certificate

data.name: Immunity from listing
data.description: Whether you have an immunity from listing

data.name: Interest in the land
data.description: What your interest in the land is

data.name: Listed building alterations
data.description: What you're proposing to do to a listed building

data.name: Listed building grading
data.description: What grade the listed building is

data.name: Location of advertisement(s)
data.description: Where your advert will be situated

data.name: Materials
data.description: Details about the materials to be used or changed should be provided, including type, colour and name for each material

data.name: Neighbour and community consultation
data.description: Neighbours should be informed about development proposals and seek feedback

data.name: Non-material amendment(s) sought
data.description: Description of proposed development

data.name: Ownership certificates and agricultural land declaration
data.description: Ownership of the site and/or property for development needs to be understood

data.name: Parking
data.description: Details of how the proposed development will affect the parking area required

data.name: Part discharge of condition(s)
data.description: Submitting information to discharge part of a condition

data.name: Pedestrian and vehicle access, roads and rights of way
data.description: Any changes to how people or vehicles access the site, including any new or affected roads, footpaths, or public rights of way

data.name: Plans, drawings and other supporting material

data.description: Details of pre-application advice received from the local planning authority

data.name: Related proposals
data.description: Other applications related to the same site

data.name: Residential units (including conversion)
data.description: The amount of residential units included as part of your proposal

data.description: Details to locate the site proposed for development

data.description: Size of the site

data.name: Storage
data.description: Any storage of materials proposed during construction

data.name: Supporting information

data.description: Effluents that will be produced from a process or activity undertaken on the site

data.name: Trees - additional information
data.description: Additional information about trees on the site

data.description: Details of trees and hedges affecting the site or that will be affected by the proposed development

data.description: Location of trees on the site

data.description: Ownership of trees on the site

data.name: Type of development
data.description: Type of development

data.name: Type of proposed advertisement(s)
data.description: Type of proposed advertisement

data.name: Types of application
data.description: Type of application

data.name: Vehicle parking
data.description: Existing and proposed number of on-site parking spaces

data.name: Voluntary agreements / planning obligations
data.description: Any voluntary agreements or planning obligations

data.name: Waste storage and collection
data.description: Proposed waste storage and collection

data.name: Interest details
data.description: Who owns the land or building and the applicant's interest

data.name: Hedgerow removal notice
data.description: Details about the hedgerows being removed

data.name: Additional information
data.description: Any additional information (such as hours of use of other machinery within the site-generators, pumps, etc)

data.name: Additional material information
data.description: Additional context or details about the materials to be used in the development

data.name: Address Text
data.description: Flexible field for capturing addresses

data.name: Addresses
data.description: A list of addresses for the adjoining properties

data.name: Advert end date
data.description: The end of the time period that consent to advertisement is sought

data.name: Advert placed date
data.description: Date when the advertisement was placed (YYYY-MM-DD format)

data.name: Advert start date
data.description: The start of the time period that consent to advertisement is sought

data.name: Advertisement count
data.description: Number of this type of advertisement

data.name: Advertisement other description
data.description: Details required if other advertisement type is selected

data.name: Advertisement proposal description
data.description: Description of the advertisement proposal

data.name: Advertisement proposal type
data.description: Expected to provide counts for each advertisement type

data.name: Advertisement type
data.description: One of the advertisement-types or other

data.name: Advertisements
data.description: Structured data about each proposed advertisement

data.name: Advice date
data.description: Date when pre-application advice was received, in YYYY-MM-DD format

data.name: Advice from authority
data.description: Any advice provided on-site by a Local Planning Authority (LPA) officer

data.name: Pre-application advice sought
data.description: Whether pre-application advice has been sought from the planning authority

data.name: Advice summary
data.description: Summary of the pre-application advice received from the planning authority

data.name: Agent reference
data.description: A reference to an agent object

data.description: Digital signature of the agent (if applicable)

data.description: Details of the agent

data.description: Summary of the agreement

data.name: Agricultural tenants

data.description: Details of any air traffic and defence asset impacts, including how these will be mitigated

data.name: Amount paid
data.description: The amount paid towards the application fee

data.name: Amount
data.description: The total amount due for the application fee

data.name: Annual throughput
data.description: Maximum annual operational throughput in tonnes/litres

data.name: Applicant interest adjoining land
data.description: Description of the applicant's interest in the adjacent land

data.description: Description of the applicant's interest in the land

data.name: Applicant land interest
data.description: Does the applicant have an interest in the land

data.description: True or False indicating whether the applicant owns the land where the advertisement will be displayed

data.name: Applicant reference
data.description: Reference to match contact details to a named individual from the applicant details component

data.name: Applicant signature
data.description: Digital signature of the applicant

data.name: Application result
data.description: Provide the result of the application for a certificate of immunity

data.name: Application sub type
data.description: Further classification of the application type for specific variations within the main application type

data.name: Application types
data.description: A list of planning application types that define the nature of the planning application

data.name: Application
data.description: The details of the application payload to be submitted

data.name: Archaeological features impact
data.description: Where is there a likelihood of features of archaeological conservation importance being affected?

data.name: Base64
data.description: Base64-encoded content of the file for inline file uploads

data.name: Biodiversity features impact
data.description: Where is there a likelihood of important habitats or biodiversity features being affected?

data.name: Biodiversity gain condition applies
data.description: Does the applicant believe the Biodiversity Gain Condition applies to this application

data.name: Biodiversity gain condition exemption reason
data.description: Reasons why BNG does not apply, referencing exemptions or transitional arrangements

data.name: Biodiversity net gain details
data.description: Comprehensive details about biodiversity net gain assessment including pre-development value, habitat loss information, and supporting documentation

data.name: Biodiversity gain exemption
data.description: Statement whether the biodiversity gain condition will apply if permission is granted. Householder applicants need to confirm the biodiversity gain condition does not apply.

data.name: Building element type
data.description: The part of building the materials relate to, such as walls, roofs, windows, or doors

data.name: Building elements
data.description: Details of materials for a specific building element such as walls, roof, windows or doors

data.name: Building height exceeds 18m
data.description: Will the height of the extended building exceed 18 metres

data.name: Site seen from public area
data.description: Can site be seen from a public road, public footpath, bridleway or other public land

data.name: Causing structural damage
data.description: Whether structural damage is being caused by the tree(s)

data.description: Whether subsidence damage is being caused by the tree(s)

data.name: Ceiling height exceeds 3m
data.description: Will the internal floor-to-ceiling height of any additional storey exceed 3 metres

data.name: Certificate of immunity sought
data.description: Has a certificate of immunity been sought

data.name: Change to right of way
data.description: Will the proposal change public rights of way (diversion/extinguishment/creation)

data.name: Checksum
data.description: Hash of the file contents used for file validation and checking files have not been tampered with

data.name: Close time
data.description: Closing time

data.name: Closed
data.description: True or False - explicitly state when closed

data.name: Colour
data.description: Colour of proposed sign

data.name: Commercial industrial
data.description: Maximum throughput for commercial and industrial waste (annual throughput in tonnes/litres)

data.name: Company
data.description: The name of a company (that the agent works for)

data.name: Condition change
data.description: State how the condition should vary

data.name: Condition concerns
data.description: Whether there are concerns the tree(s) are diseased or might break or fall

data.name: Condition number
data.description: Number of any condition being breached

data.description: List of condition numbers related to this application

data.name: Conflict details
data.description: Details of the conflict of interest including name, role and how the individual is related to the planning authority

data.name: Conflict person name
data.description: Name of the individual with the conflict of interest that matches one of the names provided in applicants/agent section

data.name: Conflict to declare
data.description: Indicates whether any named applicant or agent has a relationship to the planning authority that must be declared

data.name: Connect to drainage system
data.description: Whether the proposal needs to connect to the existing drainage system

data.name: Construction demolition
data.description: Maximum throughput for construction and demolition waste (annual throughput in tonnes/litres)

data.name: Contact details
data.description: A structured object containing contact information for an individual. This component is required for planning in principle (PiP) applications and optional for other application types. Contains email and phone contact information.

data.name: Contact priority
data.description: The priority of a number

data.name: Contact reference
data.description: The reference of the applicant or agent who should be contacted for site visits

data.description: Indicates who the authority should contact to arrange a site visit

data.name: Data provided by
data.description: Who provided the data: Applicant or System/Service?

data.name: Day type
data.description: Day or type of day

data.description: The date when the decision was made, in YYYY-MM-DD format

data.description: Confirms the applicant or agent has reviewed and validated the information provided in the application

data.description: Additional details or information about an item
